attributes.action: Require MPs to behave in a civilised manner, especially during PMQ's.
attributes.background: The behaviour of many MPs is astonishingly poor, when televised these elected representatives must behave as role models. They are currently an embarrassment to the nation.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this is the personal responsibility of the Speaker of the House of Commons and not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.

You can find out more about the rules that the Speaker and his Deputies apply here:

https://www.parliament.uk/documents/rules-of-behaviour.pdf

You could start a new petition calling for the House of Commons to change its rules, if there is a change you would like to see.
